alert.note: Alert for Dawes; North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 2:57AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snowfall accumulations of 1 to 3 inches possible, mainly along the Pine Ridge. Winds gusting up to 40 MPH. * WHERE...In Wyoming, southern Niobrara County including Lusk and Van Tassel. In the northern Nebraska Panhandle, northern Sioux and Dawes Counties including Harrison, Crawford, and Chadron. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Extremely dangerous or impossible travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
